price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߛߍ߲߬ߓߍ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߘߏ߬ߝߙߏ߫ ߝߙߌߛߌ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߎ߬ߞߎߓߊ߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߢߌߡߊ߫ ߜߊ߲߬ߛߊ߲
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā rafrafin khuḍ'rin waʿabqariyyin ḥisānin
